title: Phase 12: Plugin Packaging
description: SKILL.md, slash commands (/browser, /screenshot, /pdf, /extract), hooks for cleanup, plugin.json manifest.

title: Phase 11: Interactive Help System
description: browser_help() tool for on-demand documentation, examples, and CDP reference.

title: Phase 6: PDF Generation
description: Print pages to PDF with full option control: paper size, margins, headers/footers, backgrounds, page ranges.

title: Phase 4: Content Extraction
description: Extract HTML, text, and markdown from pages. Includes HTML-to-Markdown converter preserving structure.

title: Phase 9: Session Management
description: Cookie get/set/clear/save/load, Chrome profile directory management for persistent logins.

title: Phase 3: Navigation & Page Basics
description: Navigate to URLs, wait for load events, reload/back/forward, get current URL, wait for selectors.

title: Phase 10: Network Module (Optional)
description: Optional module for network monitoring (request/response capture) and interception (block, mock, throttle).

title: Phase 2: Browser Lifecycle Management
description: Chrome detection (macOS/Linux/WSL), auto-launch with debugging port, PID tracking, graceful shutdown, health checks.

title: chrome-driver: Pure Perl Chrome DevTools Plugin
description: A Claude Code plugin enabling LLMs to interact with web pages via Chrome DevTools Protocol, implemented in pure Perl with zero external dependencies. See SPEC.md and IMPLEMENTATION.md for full details.

title: Phase 5: Visual Capture
description: Screenshots (PNG/JPEG/WebP, full-page, element), screencast frame capture for video sequences.

title: Phase 8: JavaScript Execution
description: evaluate(), evaluate_async(), evaluate_on(), and raw CDP access (cdp_send, cdp_subscribe).

title: Phase 7: DOM Interaction
description: Element queries, high-level actions (click, type, select, hover, focus, scroll), input event dispatching.

title: Fix back() navigation timeout issue
description: The _wait_for_url_change helper method times out because Runtime.evaluate may fail during bfcache transitions. Need to handle undefined current_url gracefully.

title: Phase 1: WebSocket & CDP Communication Core
description: Implement RFC 6455 WebSocket frames, connection handling, CDP protocol messaging, and event system. Core foundation - everything depends on this.

title: Phase 13: Testing & Polish
description: Integration tests, error message review, documentation, troubleshooting guide.
